messages.content: What type of license is the GNU General Public License version 3?
The GNU General Public License version 3 is a free, copyleft license for software and other kinds of works.
What is the purpose of the GNU General Public License?
The purpose of the GNU General Public License is to guarantee the freedom to share and change all versions of a program to make sure it remains free software for all its users.
When was version 3 of the GNU General Public License released?
Version 3 of the GNU General Public License was released on June 29, 2007.
What does it mean when a program is released under the GNU General Public License?
When a program is released under the GNU General Public License, it means that the program is free software that can be redistributed and/or modified under the terms of the License.
What is the difference between 'source code' and 'object code' as defined in the GNU General Public License?
In the GNU General Public License, 'source code' refers to the preferred form of the work for making modifications to it, while 'object code' means any non-source form of a work.
What is 'propagation' under the GNU General Public License?

Under the GNU General Public License, 'propagation' means doing anything with the work that would make you directly or secondarily liable for infringement under applicable copyright law, except executing it on a computer or modifying a private copy.
How can one convey a covered work under the GNU General Public License?

One can convey a covered work under the GNU General Public License by following the terms and conditions outlined in the license, including making sure the work, and any modifications, remain under the License and providing access to the Corresponding Source.
What is cozy-utils-comfyui-nodes?
cozy-utils-comfyui-nodes is a collection of utility nodes for ComfyUI made by the CozyMantis squad.
Who created cozy-utils-comfyui-nodes?
The CozyMantis squad created the cozy-utils-comfyui-nodes.
What is the purpose of the Cozy Sampler Options node?
The Cozy Sampler Options node is a simple node that generates a list of options for the ComfyUI Sampler node.
Is there a visual representation of the Cozy Sampler Options node?
Yes, there is an image of the Comfy Sampler Options node provided in the assets folder of the cozy-utils-comfyui-nodes package.
How can I access more resources from the creators of cozy-utils-comfyui-nodes?
You can access more resources from the CozyMantis squad by visiting their Gumroad page at https://cozymantis.gumroad.com/.
Are the cozy-utils-comfyui-nodes open source?
The information provided does not specify whether the cozy-utils-comfyui-nodes are open source.
Is there a node to directly integrate cozy-utils-comfyui-nodes with the ComfyUI Sampler node?
Yes, the Cozy Sampler Options node is designed to generate a list of options for direct integration with the ComfyUI Sampler node.
